FuncDef: This command specifies the neighbor address as found in the source address of the actual join and prune message as a filter criterion. If no neighbor is specified, any neighbor is considered a match.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the neighbor IP address in dotted decimal notation. Values-ipv4-address:.

Specifies the prefix-list name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.
